description.en: Configure messages of this module here
description.de: Passe hier die Nachrichten des Modules an

default.en: This item could not be found
default.de: Dieses Item konnte nicht gefunden werden

description.en: The message that is send if the item wasn't found
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn das Item nicht gefunden wird

default.en: You haven't enough money to buy this Item
default.de: Du hast nicht genug Geld, um dieses Item zu kaufen

description.en: The message that is send if the user haven't enough money to buy an item
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn ein Benutzer nicht genug geld hat, um ein Item zu kaufen

description.en: Message for the shop. The Items gets added at the end
description.de: Die Nachricht, die den aktuellen Shop anzeigt

description.en: All items of the shop (format specified below)
description.de: Alle Items des Shops (Format wird unten angegeben)

description.en: String for the items for the shop message
description.de: Text für die Items für die Shop-Nachricht

description.en: Id of the item
description.de: ID des Items

description.en: Name of the item
description.de: Name des Items

description.en: Price of the item
description.de: Preis des Items

description.en: Count of the sales of the item
description.de: Anzahl, wie häufig das Item verkauft wurde

default.en: Please wait before using this command again

description.en: This message gets send when a user is currently in cooldown
Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user works successfully
Money that the user had earned

en: You stole a wallet and earned **%earned%**

description.en: Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user commits a crime successfully
Money that the user had earned

en: You've stolen a wallet and get caught.You loose **%loose%**

description.en: Array of messages from which one random gets send when a user fails to do some crime
Money that the user looses
This message gets send when a user robs another user successfully
Money that the user had earned
The user that gets robed by you

en.title: Leaderboard
en.description: Here you can see who has the most money

description.en: Configure the leaderboard embed here

default.en: You earned **%earned%** by collecting your daily reward

description.en: Message that gets send after the user has claimed the daily reward
Money that the user had earned

default.en: You earned **%earned%** by collecting your weekly reward

description.en: Message that gets send after the user has claimed the weekly reward
Money that the user had earned
Reply for the balance command
Current balance of the user
Current value that the user has on the bank

Username and discriminator of the User

User that can't been found
Message that gets send when a user buys something in the shop
Name of the item

default.en: Successfully created the item %name% with the id %id%. It costs %price% and you get the role %role%

description.en: Message that gets send when a new shop item gets created
Name of the created item

description.de: Name des gelöschten Items

description.en: The reply when a user deposits money to the bank
The reply when a user withdraws money from the bank

en: Message-Drop: You earned %earned% simply by chatting!

description.en: The message that gets sent on a message-drop
Message that gets send if the bot needs a number but gets something different

default.en: The Mesage-Drop message is already enabled!

description.en: Message that gets send if a User trys to enable the Message-Drop message, but it's already enabled
Message that gets send when a User enables the Message-Drop message

default.en: The Mesage-Drop message is already disabled!

description.en: Message that gets send if a User trys to disable the Message-Drop message, but it's already disabled
Message that gets send when a User disables the Message-Drop message

default.de: Du hast diese Item bereits gekauft

description.en: The message that is send when the user trys to buy an Item that he aleady own
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn der Nutzer das Item bereits besitzt

description.en: The message that gets send when multiple items match the query
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn mehrere Items der Suche entsprechen

default.en: The item with the id %id%/ the name %name% doesn't exists
default.de: Das Item mit der ID %id%/ dem Namen %name% wurde nicht gefunden

description.en: The message that gets send when the item can't be found
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn das Item nicht gefunden wird

description.en: The specified ID
description.de: Die angegebene ID

description.en: The specified name
description.de: Der angegebene Name

default.en: There's already an item with the id %id% or the name %name%
default.de: Es gibt schon ein Item mit der ID %id% oder dem Namen %name%

description.en: The message that gets send when an item with the specified id or name already exists
description.de: Die Nachricht, die gesendet wird, wenn ein Item mit dem angegebenen Namen oder der angegebenen ID schon existiert

description.de: Die angegebene ID
